OOC: I know it sounds like that, but I've been discussing this with 
Rauq.  We're working on a mechanism to make the Rogues an actual 
functional group.  Besides, in a war, the whole IDEA is to either 
destroy your enemies or force them to surrender.  The Rogues are 
simply using terror tactics to KO the existing governments in their 
own time.  Now that they're here (if they ever get around to showing 
up), it's a whole new ball-game for them.

Wheeljack-X::

"Who knows?" Wheeljack-X answers, mystified.  "I mean, I've been to a 
lot of the sleazier starports in the galaxy, doing this or that 
repair job to make some cash, so maybe I'd be able to tell them 
something they don't know.  Or maybe they just got off the wrong side 
of the recharge bed."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightlight::
> 
> "Perhaps... they were looking for something... "replied Nightlight
>
